alert.note: Alert for East Glacier Park Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 1:22PM MST until December 28 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TUESDAY TO 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow, mixing with rain or freezing rain at times, especially at and below pass level. Total snow accumulations up to 6 inches and ice accumulations around one tenth of an inch. Higher snow accumulations of 10 to 20 inches expected above pass level. Winds gusting as high as 80 mph. * WHERE...East Glacier Park Region. * WHEN...From 8 AM Tuesday to 11 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Very strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
